events.title: PPI m/m
events.description: Producer Price Index measures prices received by domestic producers. Leading indicator of consumer inflation.
events.whyItMatters: Rising producer prices often get passed to consumers. Can signal future CPI direction.

events.title: Consumer Credit m/m
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: 4-Week Bill Auction
events.whyItMatters: Short-term funding rate. Reflects money market conditions.

events.title: 8-Week Bill Auction
events.whyItMatters: Short-term funding rate.

events.title: ISM Services PMI
events.description: ISM survey of service sector purchasing managers. Services represent ~80% of US economy.
events.whyItMatters: Services dominate the US economy. This is increasingly more important than manufacturing PMI.

events.title: EIA Short-Term Energy Outlook
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: Crude Oil Inventories
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: 10-Year Note Auction
events.description: US Treasury auction for 10-year government notes.
events.whyItMatters: 10-year yield is benchmark for mortgages and corporate bonds. Weak auctions can spike yields.

typicalReaction.higherThanExpected: Strong demand = yields fall, USD mildly bullish
typicalReaction.lowerThanExpected: Weak demand = yields rise, USD mildly bearish

events.title: CPI m/m
events.description: Consumer Price Index measures the monthly change in prices paid by consumers for goods and services.
events.whyItMatters: Primary inflation gauge that central banks target. Higher inflation typically leads to rate hikes, lower inflation to rate cuts.

typicalReaction.higherThanExpected: Currency bullish (rate hike expectations), bonds bearish, gold mixed
typicalReaction.lowerThanExpected: Currency bearish (rate cut expectations), bonds bullish

events.title: Current Account
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: Natural Gas Storage
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: Federal Budget Balance
events.description: Monthly US government budget surplus or deficit.
events.whyItMatters: Large deficits can affect Treasury supply and long-term rates.

events.title: PPI m/m
events.description: Producer Price Index measures prices received by domestic producers. Leading indicator of consumer inflation.
events.whyItMatters: Rising producer prices often get passed to consumers. Can signal future CPI direction.

events.title: 4-Week Bill Auction
events.whyItMatters: Short-term funding rate. Reflects money market conditions.

events.title: 8-Week Bill Auction
events.whyItMatters: Short-term funding rate.

events.title: 30-Year Bond Auction
events.description: US Treasury auction for 30-year government bonds.
events.whyItMatters: Long-end of yield curve. Sensitive to inflation expectations.

events.title: Industrial Production m/m
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: ISM Services PMI
events.description: ISM survey of service sector purchasing managers. Services represent ~80% of US economy.
events.whyItMatters: Services dominate the US economy. This is increasingly more important than manufacturing PMI.

events.title: Crude Oil Inventories
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: FOMC Rate Decision
events.description: Federal Reserve's decision on the federal funds target rate.
events.whyItMatters: The most important monetary policy decision globally. Rate changes affect borrowing costs, currency values, and asset prices worldwide.

typicalReaction.higherThanExpected: USD bullish, stocks bearish, bonds bearish
typicalReaction.lowerThanExpected: USD bearish, stocks bullish, bonds bullish

events.title: FOMC Economic Projections
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: Fed Chair Press Conference
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: Natural Gas Storage
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: PPI m/m
events.description: Producer Price Index measures prices received by domestic producers. Leading indicator of consumer inflation.
events.whyItMatters: Rising producer prices often get passed to consumers. Can signal future CPI direction.

events.title: 4-Week Bill Auction
events.whyItMatters: Short-term funding rate. Reflects money market conditions.

events.title: 8-Week Bill Auction
events.whyItMatters: Short-term funding rate.

events.title: Unemployment Claims
events.description: Weekly count of individuals filing for unemployment insurance for the first time. Also called Initial Jobless Claims.
events.whyItMatters: High-frequency indicator of labor market conditions. Rising claims can be an early warning of economic weakness.

events.title: ISM Services PMI
events.description: ISM survey of service sector purchasing managers. Services represent ~80% of US economy.
events.whyItMatters: Services dominate the US economy. This is increasingly more important than manufacturing PMI.

events.title: Crude Oil Inventories
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: 2-Year Note Auction
events.description: US Treasury auction for 2-year government notes.
events.whyItMatters: Short-end of curve most sensitive to Fed policy expectations.

events.title: GDP q/q
events.description: Quarterly change in Gross Domestic Product - the broadest measure of economic activity.
events.whyItMatters: Shows overall economic health. Two consecutive negative quarters typically defines recession.

events.title: Durable Goods Orders m/m
events.description: New orders for long-lasting manufactured goods (3+ year lifespan).
events.whyItMatters: Shows business investment intentions. Very volatile due to aircraft orders.

events.title: Natural Gas Storage
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: 5-Year Note Auction
events.description: US Treasury auction for 5-year government notes.
events.whyItMatters: Middle of the curve. Key benchmark for corporate bonds.

events.title: Retail Sales m/m
events.description: Monthly change in total value of sales at retail level.
events.whyItMatters: Consumer spending drives 70% of GDP. First look at monthly consumer activity.

events.title: Core PCE Price Index m/m
events.description: Personal Consumption Expenditures Price Index excluding food and energy. Fed's preferred inflation measure.
events.whyItMatters: THE inflation measure the Fed targets. More important than CPI for Fed policy.

typicalReaction.higherThanExpected: USD bullish, bonds bearish, stocks mixed
typicalReaction.lowerThanExpected: USD bearish, bonds bullish, stocks mixed

events.title: 7-Year Note Auction
events.description: US Treasury auction for 7-year government notes.
events.whyItMatters: Part of the belly of the curve.

events.title: PPI m/m
events.description: Producer Price Index measures prices received by domestic producers. Leading indicator of consumer inflation.
events.whyItMatters: Rising producer prices often get passed to consumers. Can signal future CPI direction.

events.whyItMatters: Short-term funding rate. Reflects money market conditions.

events.title: 8-Week Bill Auction
events.whyItMatters: Short-term funding rate.

events.title: ISM Services PMI
events.description: ISM survey of service sector purchasing managers. Services represent ~80% of US economy.
events.whyItMatters: Services dominate the US economy. This is increasingly more important than manufacturing PMI.

events.title: JOLTS Job Openings
events.description: Job Openings and Labor Turnover Survey measures the number of job openings, hires, and separations.
events.whyItMatters: Shows labor demand. High openings relative to unemployed workers indicates a tight labor market, which can fuel wage inflation.

events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: Durable Goods Orders m/m

events.title: ISM Services PMI
events.description: ISM survey of service sector purchasing managers. Services represent ~80% of US economy.
events.whyItMatters: Services dominate the US economy. This is increasingly more important than manufacturing PMI.

events.title: Trade Balance
events.description: Difference between exports and imports of goods and services.
events.whyItMatters: Large deficits can weaken currency. Trade data affects GDP calculations.

events.title: Crude Oil Inventories
events.whyItMatters: May affect market sentiment and currency values.

events.title: Non-Farm Payrolls
events.description: Measures the change in the number of employed people in the US, excluding farm workers, government employees, private household employees, and nonprofit organization employees.
events.whyItMatters: The most important employment indicator. Strong job growth signals economic expansion and can lead to Fed rate hikes. Weak numbers suggest economic slowdown and potential rate cuts.

typicalReaction.higherThanExpected: USD bullish, stocks mixed (good economy but higher rates), bonds bearish
typicalReaction.lowerThanExpected: USD bearish, stocks mixed (weak economy but lower rates), bonds bullish

events.title: Non-Farm Payrolls
events.description: Measures the change in the number of employed people in the US, excluding farm workers, government employees, private household employees, and nonprofit organization employees.

typicalReaction.higherThanExpected: USD bullish, stocks mixed (good economy but higher rates), bonds bearish
typicalReaction.lowerThanExpected: USD bearish, stocks mixed (weak economy but lower rates), bonds bullish

events.title: PPI m/m
events.description: Producer Price Index measures prices received by domestic producers. Leading indicator of consumer inflation.

events.title: 10-Year Note Auction

typicalReaction.higherThanExpected: Strong demand = yields fall, USD mildly bullish
typicalReaction.lowerThanExpected: Weak demand = yields rise, USD mildly bearish

events.title: Federal Budget Balance
events.description: Monthly US government budget surplus or deficit.
events.whyItMatters: Large deficits can affect Treasury supply and long-term rates.

events.title: CPI m/m
events.description: Consumer Price Index measures the monthly change in prices paid by consumers for goods and services.
events.whyItMatters: Primary inflation gauge that central banks target. Higher inflation typically leads to rate hikes, lower inflation to rate cuts.

typicalReaction.higherThanExpected: Currency bullish (rate hike expectations), bonds bearish, gold mixed
typicalReaction.lowerThanExpected: Currency bearish (rate cut expectations), bonds bullish

events.title: FOMC Rate Decision
events.description: Federal Reserve's decision on the federal funds target rate.
events.whyItMatters: The most important monetary policy decision globally. Rate changes affect borrowing costs, currency values, and asset prices worldwide.

typicalReaction.higherThanExpected: USD bullish, stocks bearish, bonds bearish
typicalReaction.lowerThanExpected: USD bearish, stocks bullish, bonds bullish
